parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Valeriu Iftime, president of PNL Botoșani, and encourages voters to vote for the PNL team in the parliamentary elections.  It also lists other candidates: Eduard Mititelu, Buliga Luciana, Dumitriu Alexandru, #Jitaru_Ovidiu and Ionela Aiftincă. This directly refers to specific parliamentary candidates and fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Botoșani County and surrounding areas, as evidenced by the `aaa_info` section specifying numerous cities and towns. This clearly addresses the wide population and is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters in Botoșani County to vote for Valeriu Iftime's PNL team. Phrases like "voteze...echipa PNL," "votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime," and the repeated emphasis on voting for the PNL team on the first position on the ballot clearly demonstrate an intention to influence the vote. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it mentions facts (Iftime's position), the overall tone and purpose are clearly promotional and persuasive, aiming to sway voters, not to inform objectively. It lacks the neutrality and objectivity expected of journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not a personal opinion; it's a structured campaign message promoting a specific political party and its candidates. The language used is not that of personal expression but of political campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>884598480552277</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific candidates (Valeriu Iftime and others from PNL), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PNL team. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  The argument that it's simply informing people about the candidates is weak, given the explicitly persuasive language and call to action.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Eduard Mititelu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Buliga Luciana</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Dumitriu Alexandru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Jitaru Ovidiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Ionela Aiftincă</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 884598480552277) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează explicit candidații Valeriu Iftime, Eduard Mititelu, Buliga Luciana, Dumitriu Alexandru, Jitaru Ovidiu și Ionela Aiftincă de la PNL,  încurajând votul pentru aceștia. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON,  a avut o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, concentrată în județul Botoșani și zonele limitrofe, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Textul postării, cu fraze precum „votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime” și îndemnul direct la vot pentru echipa PNL, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul în favoarea candidaților menționați.  Această acțiune constituie o încălcare a legii, având un efect electoral direct și vizibil.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
